backend/main.mo: Defines meditation app backend actor with data types for books, journal entries, sessions, rituals, user profiles, and progress tracking plus initial book list.
feature_evidence.json: Lists two theming-related features, their affected files, components, tests, and confidence metadata for build verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains a map of frontend file paths to brief functional summaries for reference during development.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RUNBOOK.md: Provides step‑by‑step instructions for redeploying the frontend and backend without code changes.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Template for diagnosing deployment failures across install, backend, build, and runtime stages.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes plus global resets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting up the root app container, favicon, env shim, and global error handlers.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with theme provider, error boundary, and toaster.
frontend/src/components/AmbientMusicCaro: Audio carousel component allowing selection, preview, mute, volume control, and swipe navigation for ambient sounds.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches runtime errors and renders a detailed fallback UI with error info and reload button.
frontend/src/components/CloudSyncErrorBa: Displays an error banner for cloud sync issues with dynamic messaging and a retry button.
frontend/src/components/DurationRangeInp: Slider-based input for selecting a duration in minutes with min/max limits.
frontend/src/components/FeatureCard.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/FloatingNav.tsx: Floating vertical navigation bar with animated icons and hover labels that routes between app sections.
frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.ts: Mobile sidebar menu providing theme toggle, account actions, and navigation, integrated with authentication state.
frontend/src/components/JournalFiltersDr: Popover-based filter UI for journal entries allowing mood, energy, date, favorites, and text filtering.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeBookPag: Paginated reader component supporting swipe, keyboard navigation, and smooth scrolling between content pages.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeCategor: Carousel component for selecting knowledge categories with swipe, keyboard, and button navigation and dynamic positioning of items.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeQuizDia: Modal dialog presenting a shuffled multiple‑choice quiz with progress tracking, navigation, scoring, and retake functionality.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusM: Three.js lotus model that animates petals, glow, and stem based on growth state and theme.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusP: Animated particle system around the lotus that shifts between chaotic and coherent motion depending on growth state.
frontend/src/components/LotusCanvas.tsx: Canvas-based animated lotus and particle effect responsive to theme, variant, and intensity settings.
frontend/src/components/MeditationCarous: Carousel for choosing meditation types with swipe navigation and center‑focused scaling transitions.
frontend/src/components/MeditationGuideS: Stepper UI for guided meditation steps with swipe navigation, dot indicators, and optional benefits parsing.
frontend/src/components/MeditationTimerR: Canvas-based circular timer ring with animated wave fill, glow effects, and theme-aware colors.
frontend/src/components/MeditationWaveFi: Canvas indicator showing vertical wave-based fill animation inside a clipped circle, reacting to progress and theme.
frontend/src/components/MobileBackButton: Mobile-only back button that triggers an optional callback and navigates to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/PageBackgroundSh: Page wrapper that renders a LotusCanvas background behind provided children with variant and intensity options.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBowl.tsx: Canvas-rendered bowl showing liquid fill level with glow and wave animation based on total meditation minutes and theme.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusR3F: Three.js/React-Fiber lotus visualization with lights, particles, and auto-rotating camera driven by growth state.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusSVG: SVG lotus with animated breathing, glow, and layered petals whose appearance is based on growth state and streak.
frontend/src/components/QuizDialog.tsx: Multi-step quiz dialog that collects answers, scores meditation types, and returns a recommended type.
frontend/src/components/RitualSelectionM: Modal that displays up to five saved rituals and allows starting or deleting them, showing an empty state when none exist.
frontend/src/components/SavedRitualsCaro: Carousel UI for browsing, starting, and deleting rituals with swipe navigation, confirmation dialogs, and dynamic icons.
frontend/src/components/SessionIndicator: Displays guest or logged‑in session status and provides logout or return‑to‑start actions with query cleanup.
Navigation bar with theme toggle, session indicator, optional back button, and mobile menu integration.
frontend/src/components/ThemedToaster.ts: Wrapper that renders a themed Toaster component with a close button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCloudOperation.ts: Hook providing a retry‑aware wrapper for cloud write operations using the current actor and identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing login state and identity helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useMeditationTimer.ts: Implements a configurable meditation timer hook with start, pause, reset, progress tracking, and completion callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data, supporting authenticated and guest modes with local storage fallbacks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, theme variables, Tailwind layers, and custom animations for the frontend UI.
frontend/src/lib/bookData.ts: Exports a list of meditation‑related book recommendations with metadata and Amazon links.
frontend/src/lib/knowledgeContent.ts: Provides structured educational content and quizzes for meditation techniques.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
Empty or placeholder file for the Active Meditation page.
frontend/src/pages/BookRecommendationsPa: Carousel page displaying book recommendations with swipe navigation and theme controls.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard showing quotes, meditation selection, rituals, and navigation to meditation flows.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Journal management page handling filtering, editing, favoriting, import/export, and cloud sync states.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgePage.tsx: Knowledge library with technique categories, content display, and quiz scoring tied to identity.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing screen with login, guest mode, theme toggle, and redirect logic for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/PreMeditationPage.tsx: Page component for configuring a meditation session, selecting type, duration, ambient sound, mood, and saving rituals before starting the timer.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Displays meditation progress stats, bowl visualization, rank, and supports data import/export with cloud sync error handling.
frontend/src/utils/ambientSounds.ts: Defines ambient sound metadata and helpers to retrieve sound info or paths by ID.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSync.ts: Provides cloud sync error definitions and a function to map backend errors to user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSyncRetry.ts: Implements retry logic for cloud operations, classifying authorization vs readiness errors.
frontend/src/utils/exportImport.ts: Handles serialization and validation for exporting and importing meditation data in a safe JSON format.
Manages quiz score storage per user, with localStorage persistence and identity-aware retrieval.
frontend/src/utils/lotusGrowthModel.ts: Computes lotus growth state parameters over a 0–20,000 minute timeline with phased progression and smooth visual transitions.
frontend/src/utils/meditationStorage.ts: Manages guest-only meditation data in localStorage, including journals, progress, rituals, and legacy migration.
frontend/src/utils/meditationType.ts: Validates and normalizes meditation type strings to supported enum values with fallback handling.
frontend/src/utils/progressRanks.ts: Defines progress rank tiers and utility functions for determining current, next, and displayable rank data based on total minutes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, shadows, radii, and plugins using OKLCH-based theme variables.
project_state.json: Describes project state and requirements for restoring global OKLCH theme variables in light and dark modes.
